name: PlancorpPerspective
0:
”Alexa, ask plancorp perspective to play the latest update”
”Alexa, ask plancorp perspective to tell me about the company”
”Alexa, ask plancorp perspective to tell me about the president”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: plancorp perspective
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hear the latest viewpoint on market events from your financial advisors at Plancorp. Enable this skill then say, "Alexa, play the latest update from Plancorp."

Other things you can ask (first say, "Alexa, open Plancorp Perspective."):

"Tell me about the company."
"Tell me about the President."
"Tell me about the Chief Investment Officer."

Learn more: www.plancorp.com

Follow us: 
Twitter: @Plancorp_LLC
Instagram: @plancorpllc

Request an invite to launch your own custom Alexa skill like this at WealthVoice.ai
